Autoclosable database connection class based on ConnectionPool.

    • open

      public static SqlConnection open(ConnectionPool pool, boolean autoCommit) throws SQLException
      Open autoclosable database connection
      Parameter:
      pool - connection pool
      autoCommit - auto commit mode for connection
      Gibt zurück:
      autoclosable database connection object
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - on error establishing database connection
